name: etrader-monorepo
description: TL;DR; Para este desafio você precisará construir esta maravilhosa landing page utilizando algum framework Javascript (React, VueJS, Angular, Svelte, etc.).

scripts.prestart: concurrently -k -s first -n "API,LANDING_PAGE" -c "green,yellow" "cd api && npm i" "cd landing-page && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -s first -n "API,LANDING_PAGE" -c "green,yellow" "cd api && npm run dev" "cd landing-page && npm run start"
